001package src.pkg_rooms;
002import src.pkg_game.GameEngine;
003
004/**
005 * This class represents a special type of room in the game, known as a transporter room.
006 * A transporter room can randomly teleport the player to another room in the game.
007 * It extends the basic functionality of a Room and adds teleportation capabilities.
008 * 
009 * @author Pierre MATAR
010 */
011public class TransporterRoom extends Room
012{
013    private boolean aIsTransporterRoom;
014    private GameEngine aGameEngine;
015    private Room aTransporterRoom;
016    private RoomRandomizer aRoomRandomizer;
017    
018    
019     /**
020     * Constructor to initialize a transporter room with specific properties.
021     * 
022     * @param pName The name of the room.
023     * @param pDescription A description of the room.
024     * @param pImage The image representing the room.
025     * @param pIsTransporterRoom A flag indicating if the room is a transporter room.
026     * @param pGameEngine The game engine for managing room and game state.
027     */
028    
029    public TransporterRoom(final String pName, final String pDescription, final String pImage, final boolean pIsTransporterRoom, final GameEngine pGameEngine) {
030        super(pName,pDescription, pImage);
031        this.aIsTransporterRoom = pIsTransporterRoom;
032        this.aGameEngine = pGameEngine;
033        this.aTransporterRoom = this;
034    }
035    
036    /**
037     * Constructor to initialize a transporter room without specifying transporter functionality.
038     * This constructor defaults the transporter room flag to false and passes null for the game engine.
039     * 
040     * @param pName The name of the room.
041     * @param pDescription A description of the room.
042     * @param pImage The image representing the room.
043     */
044    
045    public TransporterRoom(final String pName, final String pDescription, final String pImage) {
046        this(pName, pDescription, pImage, false, null);
047    }
048    
049    /**
050     * @return True if the room is a transporter room, false otherwise.
051     */
052    
053    public boolean isATransporterRoom() {
054        return this.aIsTransporterRoom;
055    }
056    
057     /**
058     * Returns the exit in the specified direction.
059     * If the direction is valid, it calls the parent method to retrieve the exit.
060     * Otherwise, it teleports the player to a random room.
061     * 
062     * @param pDirection The direction of the exit.
063     * @return The room that the player can enter after moving in the specified direction or a random room.
064     */
065    
066    @Override
067    public Room getExit(final String pDirection) {
068        if (pDirection != null) return super.getExit(pDirection);
069        return this.findRandomRoom();
070    }
071    
072     /**
073     * Finds a random room in the game and returns it.
074     * This method is used when the player attempts to move from a transporter room.
075     * 
076     * @return A randomly selected room from the available rooms in the game.
077     */
078    
079    private Room findRandomRoom() {
080        this.aRoomRandomizer = new RoomRandomizer(this.aGameEngine.getAleaRoom());
081        return this.aRoomRandomizer.getRandomRoom(this.aGameEngine.getRooms(), this.aTransporterRoom);
082    }
083    
084    
085    
086}
